name: Hero Image Narrow
editableFields: Hero Image Narrow: URL where image resides…relative path
Hero Image Narrow link URL: HREF URL to set the link as.  If null then image displays without a hyperlink…also included is _target field
Banner Image Target: Weather you want the link to open in a new window or not
Hero Image Narrow Alt Text: Alt text for the image
description: Display a single image with optional link. Image should be sized to x
